jobDescription:
Job Title: Senior Software Developer
Location: 100% Remote
Type: Contract or Contract-to-Hire (Long-Term Opportunity)
Industry: Healthcare, AI, Radiology
About Our Client:
They are seeking multiple Senior Software Developers to join their team as they ramp up their AI initiatives
and work on cutting-edge solutions in the healthcare space. As a key player in the healthcare technology sector, you’ll
be part of a growing team supporting clinical research, AI development, and deployment of innovative solutions to over
2,500 physicians.
Job Overview:
We are looking for multiple Senior Software Developers to join our client's dynamic team. This is a great opportunity for
individuals with strong experience in .NET, C#, cloud technologies, and a passion for AI and healthcare solutions. The

role is 100% remote, and the client is firm on converting contract developers into permanent team members for long-
term success.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop, implement, and maintain complex software applications using C# and .NET 8+.
• Work with PostgreSQL and Entity Framework Core to manage and interact with databases.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy AI-driven solutions for healthcare
applications.
• Leverage AWS services such as Lambda, Cognito, CloudWatch, Aurora, Bedrock, and VPC for cloud-based
application development.
• Contribute to the growth and maintenance of the client’s platform and software systems.
• Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices for development and testing.
• Continuously improve and optimize software solutions for scalability, security, and performance.
Required Skills and Experience:
• Strong proficiency in C# and .NET 8+ development.
• Expertise in PostgreSQL and Entity Framework Core for database management.
• Experience with GitHub for version control and collaboration.
• Solid understanding of cloud computing, particularly AWS services such as Lambda, Cognito, CloudWatch,
Aurora, Bedrock, and VPC.
Preferred Skills:
• Experience with Angular 18+ for front-end development.
• Proficiency in Python 3.12+ for additional backend development needs.
• Familiarity with AI development and applications, especially in healthcare.
Nice to Have:
• Prior experience in healthcare software or clinical research environments.
• Exposure to AI technologies and machine learning frameworks.
Why Join Us:
• Work with a rapidly expanding, cutting-edge healthcare company at the forefront of AI innovation.
• Be part of a dynamic and collaborative team with opportunities for long-term growth.
• Fully remote work environment providing flexibility and work-life balance.
• Opportunity to transition from contract to permanent employment with a high-growth company.
